page.title: 07 Homelife
page.content: {Eating Habits The school provides a midday meal at the cost of 63 pence a day.Parents may choose to let their children have this or provide sandwiches.In general the children who have a school meal have a sandwich meal in the evening the others have a cooked meal.Most of the children eat as part of their family.Not many children eat separately from their parents.The majority eat in the kitchen,followed very closely by the number who watch the television in the sitting room while eating their meal.The number of children that eat in the dining room and sitting room is low.The kitchen is becoming an important room in the house.No longer is it used for food preparation alone but it doubles as a family room,many incorporate purpose built dining bays.
